author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two persons were held for an alleged attempt to rob a youth at gunpoint near Parakkai Road Junction on Wednesday night.

Mohaideen Rasik (35) of Rahmath Garden and Babu Hussein (33) of Bismi Nagar of Parakkai Road attempted to rob Hari (27) of Kottar at Parakkai Road Junction. Since Mr. Hari did not have any money, they threatened him with guns. On a complaint lodged by Mr. Hari, Kottar police arrested them and seized two country-made guns from them on Thursday night.

They were produced before a magistrate court and remanded in judicial custody.
title: Two held for bid to rob at gunpoint
